co.poynt.os.services.v1

Interface IPoyntCustomerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.IInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPoyntCustomerService.Stub

    public interface IPoyntCustomerService
extends android.os.IInterface
    Provides the interfaces necessary to retrive and update Customers of the business. All calls require the necessary permissions declared in the caller's Android Manifest file. Please refer to Poynt OS Permissions for more details.
    Since:
    1.0-beta2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPoyntCustomerService.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
